DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to characterize the time profile of the decongestant properties of xylometazoline and to investigate its effect on sleep, general well-being and smell/taste.
DOC.brief_title: Decongestant Effect, Timing of Effect and Impact on Sleep and General Well-Being of Xylometazoline in Subjects With a Common Cold
DOC.criteria: Over 18 years Have had moderate common cold symptoms for less than 36 hours. Congested/runny nose for more than two continuous weeks in the previous 12 months Deviated septum or nasal polyps Recent use of antibiotics Recent sinusitis Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
